name: Horza Forizon 23
description:
Horza Forizon 23 is a racing prototype for the 32bit jam 2022.

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys for gas, steering and reverse. Space for brake.

Team members: Eirik, Even, Marius & Torstein

Credits

- Eirik: Sound effects

- Even: Graphics and level design

- Marius: Developer

- Torstein: Developer

- Vernon Adams: Anton regular font

- The Godot Engine Team

- The Blender Foundation
